clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Study on Rehabilitation Patients With Pulmonary Hypertension and Other Pulmonary Diseases

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices

brief_summary.textblock: This monocentric registry should provide information on the extent how patients with pulmonary diseases such as pulmonary hypertension will benefit from rehabilitation treatment. The data may provide a basis for further prospective studies showing the treatment of patients with pulmonary diseases especially by physical activation.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.description: Characterization of patients with pulmonary hypertension and other pulmonary diseases in a german rehabilitation clinic.

clinical_study.condition: To Characterize Patients With Pulmonary Diseases in a German Rehabilitation Clinic

study_pop.textblock: All rehabilitation patients with pulmonary diseases in the Paracelsus-Harz-Clinic Bad Suderode will be included, starting December 2013,ending Novermber 2014.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pulmonary Disease
Exclusion Criteria:
- Inability or refusal to give written informed consent
